flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
川や　池を　泳ぐ　ことが　大好きなので
水槽　なんかに　入れていたら　ぶ厚い
ガラスも　ツノの　一突きで　割って　逃げるぞ。

Goldeen loves swimming wild and free in rivers and ponds.
If one of these Pokémon is placed in an aquarium, it will
shatter even the thickest glass with one ram of its horn
and make its escape.

Goldeen ama nuotare libero in fiumi e laghetti. Se messo
in acquario, questo Pokémon riesce a fuggire spaccando
anche il vetro più spesso con un colpo secco del suo corno.

A Goldeen le encanta nadar libremente y a su aire en ríos y
estanques. Si pones a uno de estos Pokémon en un acuario,
usará el cuerno que tiene para romper las paredes,
independientemente del grosor del cristal, y escapar.

Goldini liebt es, in Teichen und Flüssen zu schwimmen.
Wenn ein solches Pokémon in ein Aquarium gebracht wird,
wird es selbst das dickste Glas mit einem Stoß seines Horns
zum Zerbersten bringen und die Flucht ergreifen.

Poissirène adore nager librement dans les rivières et
les étangs. Si l’un de ces Pokémon est mis dans un aquarium,
il n’hésitera pas à casser la vitre avec sa puissante corne pour
s’enfuir.

강이나 연못을 헤엄치는 것을 매우 좋아해서
수조 같은 곳에 넣어 두면 두꺼운
유리도 뿔의 일격으로 깨고 도망간다.

かわや　いけを　およぐ　ことが　だいすきなので
すいそう　なんかに　いれていたら　ぶあつい
ガラスも　ツノの　ひとつきで　わって　にげるぞ。

水中で　優雅に　棚引く　ひれが　とても
美しい　ポケモンだが　油断を　していると
強烈な　ツノの　一突きを　くらうぞ。

Goldeen is a very beautiful Pokémon with fins that billow
elegantly in water. However, don’t let your guard down around
this Pokémon—it could ram you powerfully with its horn.

Goldeen è un Pokémon molto elegante dai movimenti
aggraziati. Tuttavia, è necessario stare attenti poiché
potrebbe attaccare violentemente con il suo corno.

Goldeen es un bello Pokémon que mueve con elegancia las
aletas en el agua. Con todo, no hay que bajar la guardia, en
cualquier momento puede embestir con el cuerno.

Goldini ist ein wunderschönes Pokémon, dessen Flossen
sich elegant im Wasser wiegen. Aber man muss auf dieses
Pokémon achtgeben. Es könnte einen sonst heftig mit
seinem Horn rammen.

Poissirène est un Pokémon magnifique doté de nageoires
qui ondulent élégamment dans les profondeurs. Il ne faut
pourtant pas baisser sa garde face à ce Pokémon, car il peut
charger avec sa puissante corne.

물속에서 우아하게 나부끼는 지느러미가 매우
아름다운 포켓몬이지만 방심하고 있으면
강렬한 뿔의 일격을 당한다.

すいちゅうで　ゆうがに　たなびく　ひれが　とても
うつくしい　ポケモンだが　ゆだんを　していると
きょうれつな　ツノの　ひとつきを　くらうぞ。

背びれ　胸びれ　尾びれが
優雅に　たなびくので
水の踊り子　と呼ばれる。

Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in
water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.

Le pinne su dorso, petto e coda ondulano con grazia
in acqua. Per questo lo chiamano “danzatore d’acqua”.

Sus aletas dorsal, trasera y pectoral ondean gráciles
en el agua. Por eso es llamado el Bailarín Acuático.

Seine Brust-, Rücken- und Schweifflossen sehen
anmutig aus. Daher nennt man es den „Wassertänzer“.

Ses nageoires dorsales et pectorales bougent avec
élégance. Il est surnommé le danseur des flots.

등, 가슴, 꼬리지느러미가
우아하게 나부끼기 때문에
물의 무희라고 불린다.

せびれ　むなびれ　おびれが
ゆうがに　たなびくので
みずのおどりこ　とよばれる。

５ノットの　スピードで　泳ぐ。
身の　危険を　感じると
鋭い　ツノで　反撃する。

It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger,
it will strike back with its sharp horn.

Nuota alla velocità di 5 nodi. Se avverte il pericolo,
contrattacca con il suo corno aguzzo.

Nada a una velocidad de cinco nudos. Si siente
peligro, golpea con su afilado cuerno.

Es schwimmt mit fünf Knoten. Wird es angegriffen,
wehrt es sich mit seinem scharfen Horn.

Il nage à 5 nœuds. Quand on l’agresse, il réplique
d’un bon coup de corne aiguisée.

5노트의 스피드로 헤엄친다.
몸에 위험을 느끼면
날카로운 뿔로 반격한다.

５ノットの　スピードで　およぐ。
みの　きけんを　かんじると
するどい　ツノで　はんげきする。

Though it appears very elegant
when swimming with fins unfurled, it
can jab powerfully with its horn.

Though it appears very elegant
when swimming with fins unfurled, it
can jab powerfully with its horn.

Though it appears very elegant
when swimming with fins unfurled, it
can jab powerfully with its horn.

Malgré son élégance quand il
nage, ses coups de corne sont
redoutables.

Though it appears very elegant
when swimming with fins unfurled, it
can jab powerfully with its horn.

Malgré son élégance quand il
nage, ses coups de corne sont
redoutables.

A strong swimmer, it is capable of
swimming nonstop up fast streams at
a steady speed of five knots per hour.

Its dorsal, pectoral and tail fins
wave elegantly in water. That is why
it is known as the water dancer.

Though it appears very elegant
when swimming with fins unfurled, it
can jab powerfully with its horn.

It swims at a steady 5 knots.
If it senses danger, it will strike
back with its sharp horn.

It swims elegantly by flittering
its tail fin as if it were a dress.
It has the look of a queen.

Its tail fin billows like an elegant
ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of
“The Water Queen.”

Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly
developed like muscles. It can swim at a
speed of five knots.

In the springtime, schools of GOLDEEN
can be seen swimming up falls and rivers.
It metes out staggering damage with its
single horn.

GOLDEEN loves swimming wild and free
in rivers and ponds.
If one of these POKéMON is placed in an aquarium, it will shatter even the
thickest glass with one ram of its horn
and make its escape.

GOLDEEN is a very beautiful POKéMON
with fins that billow elegantly in water.
However, don’t let your guard down around this POKéMON - it could ram you
powerfully with its horn.

During spawning
season, they swim
gracefully in the water, searching
for their perfect
mate.

A strong swimmer,
it is capable of
swimming nonstop up fast streams at
a steady speed of
five knots.

Its dorsal, pecto­
ral and tail fins
wave elegantly in water. That is why
it is known as the
water dancer.

When it is time
for them to lay
eggs, they can be seen swimming up
rivers and falls
in large groups.

Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.

Its tail fin
billows like an
elegant ballroom dress, giving it
the nickname of
the Water Queen.
